name: language-docker-erb

0.1.0.description: ERB support for Dockerfiles in the name of Docker Template
0.1.0.name: language-docker-erb

readme:
# Dockerfile + ERB highlighting.

Add support for Docker Template (https://github.com/envygeeks/docker-template) ERB processing of your Dockerfiles by having both Docker and ERB within the same syntax... now your Dockerfiles won't be so hard to read.

metadata.description: ERB support for Dockerfiles in the name of Docker Template
metadata.name: language-docker-erb
